text: in a small community in the pacific northwest a dynamic company is growing this company has served the equipment dealer market for 30 years they did it by following their principles by being the best and by being honest to their customers dis technology driven people focused for ours i'm going to say for that 150 horsepower class that would be our bread and butter i'm going to say 90 of the tractors we sell are in that class on that thing there and we've got to the point where we'll get out we'll demonstrate you know uh if we have somebody go down we'll run them a tractor loan one for the time being to keep them going on that and then all of a sudden they come back in hey calf check was better than what we had we we know we need one we got a tough winter coming and we planted the seed and it came back the the combines and the four wheel drives that'd be a very nice market to be in but you look the hours these guys are putting on the machines how that's changed in the last 20 years uh they buy one of those that they might they might not have buy another one for another 20 years and these smaller ones we can get more guys rolling into them and if we can get the customer just give them the reputation where they need to trade more often we can keep our business going and our part of the country is guys will buy them and run for 10 or 15 years instead of trading after five and we would like to get to the point where you can get them to roll them more often to keep them current keep them under warranty and to realize how the technology is changing not only for their benefit but for ours also in a small community in the pacific northwest a dynamic company is growing this company has served the equipment dealer market for 30 years they did it by following their principles by being the best and by being honest to their customers dis technology driven people focused
